item.description:
So how much does Buffett pay in federal taxes? 

 

Too much? Too little?

 

What should determine what is a fair amount to pay? Should wages and investment be taxed differently?

 

To what extent should goals beyond just funding the cost of gov't be part of tax policy?  Is it ok to add taxes to bad things, to punish or discourage some sins in our fellow man?  Maybe a high tax on energy to save the planet?  ;-)

 

Should we add taxes to imported goods to help domestic companies? Or have higher taxes on corporations that some employees overseas?  Or should taxes really just be raised with the goal to fund the cost of gov't?

 

Was Daniel Webster right about the power to tax?

 

Join us for a fun moderated discussion of fairness and funding....

After the formal meetup finishes, we'll go out to Orleans for drinks and to socialize.

 

Note: Event date subject to change.

item.name: Is Warren Buffett paying his fair share?
